caption:
The photograph captures a priest standing prominently in the foreground to the left of the composition. He is wearing a traditional white alb with a decorative stole featuring Christian symbols, notably the monogram "IHS," which is a Christogram representing Jesus Christ. His expression is solemn and reflective as he gazes directly at the camera.

Behind the priest, there is an imposing white church building, characterized by its vertical structure and pointed steeple. The church front features a double door entrance, above which a sign reads "Presbyterian Church U.S.A." In the churchâ€™s architecture, arched elements and a small circular window just beneath the steeple add to its classic design.

The sky behind the scene is vivid blue, dotted with a few clouds, suggesting it is a clear day. The grass around the church is scattered with yellow flowers, possibly dandelions, adding a natural, contrasting color to the otherwise structured and man-made setting. In the distant background, there's a hint of lush greenery, likely trees lining the horizon or perhaps surrounding the church compound.

Overall, the composition and colors of the photograph create a striking contrast between the religious garb and solemnity of the priest and the vibrant, natural beauty of the environment, emphasizing both tradition and a serene, pristine setting.
title: Rev.  David t.  Ernst stands near his church, the immanuel lutheran, in plymouth.  Church is 70 years old
